sub_title: European Commercial and Regulatory Manager at Vermilion Energy
summary: Senior gas expert with a broad experience in the natural gas industry for more than 30 years. This experience covers gas sales, EU gas regulation, power purchase, due diligences, market studies, marketing strategies, underground gas storage, gas purchase contracts, project management, developing transmission tariffs, IT projects, second opinion on investment and commercial proposals to the board, export contracts, sales to power stations and technical planning.
